welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ichihara, Japan! Known for its beautiful coastline, rich history, and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chibakara (ちばから)
restaurants.description: Chibakara (ちばから) is a ramen restaurant located in 市原市.

restaurants.name: 麺や 紅丸
restaurants.description: 麺や 紅丸 is a ramen restaurant located in 市原市.

restaurants.name: KFC (ケンタッキーフライドチキン)
restaurants.description: KFC (ケンタッキーフライドチキン) is a fast food restaurant located in 市原市.

restaurants.description: Marugame Seimen (丸亀製麺) is a udon restaurant located in 市原市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 3 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Narita International Airport, serving most major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Narita International Airport, mainly used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but registration is required.
